SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (Retention of Records â€” Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (RETENTION OF RECORDS- MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) in order to address the issue identified by the Standing Joint Committee on the Scrutiny of Regulations by providing clarity regarding record retention requirements for manufacturers of new drugs.
